display_long_description:
Welcome to **Shopenkraft’s Magic Goods** — a VR crafting game where your customers are magical, their orders are ridiculous, and **you’re the one stuck fulfilling them**.
Potions? Sure. Axes? Of course. A glowing tiara made from a suspicious flower and a chunk of crystal? Don’t ask questions.

You’re the shopkeeper. You brew, forge, enchant, improvise, and occasionally panic. All in a day’s work.

**KEY FEATURES**

- **Brew weird potions** — Grind rare flowers, spill powder, stir until it bubbles, and hope the customer doesn’t turn into a frog (again).
- **Forge legendary weapons** — Melt metal, pour it into a mold, smash it into shape, and pretend you knew what you were doing the whole time.
- **Craft magical trinkets** — Combine the wrong ingredients and accidentally invent fashion.
- **Play your way** — Go full chaos in Challenge Mode or relax in Cozy Mode (no timers, just vibes).
- **Unlock stuff** — Progress through levels to upgrade your shop, discover new ingredients, and unlock even stranger recipes.
- **Keep going** — Beat Challenge or Cozy mode to unlock Survival (how long can you last?) and Zen (how long can you chill?).


**Your shop. Your mess. Your magical legacy.**

💬 Join our community & send us your weirdest bugs:
**discord.gg/nbd3vqZxEx**



**GAME HIGHLIGHTS**

[media]
[media]
